snippet: Stocks were mixed Monday on Wall Street as weekend election results in Greece and France added to the uncertainty created by last week’s disappointing jobs data in the United States.
abstract: Stocks are mixed as election results in Greece and France add to the uncertainty created by disappointing jobs data in the United States.

byline.contributor: David Jolly and Bettina Wassener contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Stocks were mixed Monday on Wall Street as weekend election results in Greece and France added to the uncertainty created by last week’s disappointing jobs data in the United States.

headline.seo: Markets Are Calm After Political Shake-Up in Europe
headline.main: Markets Are Calm After Political Shake-Up in Europe
headline.print_headline: Markets Change Little After Political Shake-Up in Europe
